Toast is a mac application that, among several other things, can mount disk images. That means that the application takes a disk image (for example, commandandconquer.dmg or GTASanAndreas.iso) and puts the contents on a virtual drive. MEANING it makes the stuff in the disk image file LOOK like it's actually on a dvd-rom in your physical drive.

nevermind, figured it out. zero hour wont update to universal binary by default when you run the update, you have to do it manually.

Follow this:
For Zero Hour update follow these steps: 1. Download this update 2. Run it. It will only update Command & Conquer Generals but not Zero Hour 3. Download Pacifist (www.charlessoft.com) 4. Get the file EN_CCG1.0.4_ZH1.0.2_Installer.pkg inside the CC Patch and open it with Pacifist. 5. Extract the file Zero Hour.app into the Zero Hour directory Now you have an universal binary which you can run on Intel Mac's

Downloaded, Worked Brilliant.


Open generals, Copy data to apps, Update generals.
Open Zero Hour, copy Data to apps, Update zero hour ( Which also updates generals )

To run:

Generals can be mounted via os x, But zero hour requires toast, im using toast 9. Mount Either image through toast and then hit the app in your apps folder.

How to get game working with patch:
1)Install C&C Generals & Zero Hour
2)Update to 1.04
3)Download file 'C&CG Zero Hour No DVD light.toast' from  http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4055968/_No_CDs or an other site
4)Mount 'C&CG Zero Hour No DVD light.toast' in Toast Titanium (I got version 8). If it doesnt mount just drag it in
5)Play

Hi guys my name is ammar , i downloaded ZH and got it to work it's very easy 
1. copy ZH folder to C&C folder 
2. download ZH NO-CD Patch from  http://loadcrack.com/0bc10002e84a1b81809684e013d047c03d79/download/crack//Command.and.Conquer.Zero.Hour.NoCD.Crack.MAC-OSX.zip.download 
open the link and wait for seconds to load 

3. open it and replace the ZH icon with the one you put in the C&C folder and it should work properly .

Enjoy :)

@kalashnikovitch

Delete the file you want to replace beforehand and then paste the new one in.

Steps to make it work:
1.Drag the C&CG folder into apps folder and update it to 1.03/1.02. Don't use 1.04
2. Download NoCD torrent mentioned by dexter090
3. Look for the corresponding cracked nocd dmg (1.02 0r 1.03)
4.Replace the original app with the crack.
5. Now install the zero hour folder.
6.download nocd as mentioned by Ammar.june
7.replace original ZH app with cracked one
Done!

Some infos:

1) NO NEED TO UPDATE. CC generals is already version 1.7 and ZH version 1.02.

2) On my config (Imac late 2010) no-cd cracks don't work, but fine to mount Generals with OSX and ZH with Toast.

3) Never managed to have any mod/upgrade work, but I don't really care.

So don't bother messing with retro-upgrades and cracks.
